thread.section_title: Pharma/Biotech Financing From Elsevier Business Intelligence
thread.title: Series A lands $22mm for SutroVax

title: Series A lands $22mm for SutroVax
text:
Series A lands $22mm for SutroVax Deal Date: Jul-01-2015 / Deal # 201530588 Executive Summary 
Infectious disease vaccines developer SutroVax Inc. raised $22mm in its Series A financing led by Abingworth, which was joined by Longitude Capital, Roche Venture Fund, and CTI Life Sciences Fund. Proceeds will help fund vaccine candidates through preclinical proof-of-concept. A representative from Abingworth joins SutroVax's board as interim chairman, and a member from both Longitude Capital and Roche Venture will take board seats.
